title: CarePass
description: End-to-end insurance platform with user onboarding, Razorpay integration, multi-user admin panel, and payment management.
longDescription: Built a complete insurance platform from scratch - converted design to frontend, implemented entire backend functionality. Features include user onboarding flow, Razorpay payment gateway integration, multi-user system with admin-level payment management.

title: Cayiba
description: Backend and admin CMS for an African e-commerce platform - a growing marketplace with mobile apps.
longDescription: Built the entire backend and admin CMS for this African e-commerce application. Self-hosted infrastructure with quality backup systems for product images, videos, and user data. App Store and Play Store launch in progress.

title: The Hardline
description: Self-hosted Ghost CMS magazine for an online newspaper with multiple users and blogs.
longDescription: Built end-to-end online magazine platform using self-hosted Ghost CMS. Actively maintained with robust backup systems, supports multiple users and multiple blogs for the newspaper's online version. Complete infrastructure management and deployment.

title: Yaavarum Hospital
description: AI-built landing page in 30 minutes - deployed free on Cloudflare Pages.
longDescription: Entire website designed and developed using AI in under 30 minutes. Hero section to footer - all AI-assisted. Deployed on Cloudflare Pages for free with optimized CI/CD. Only cost: domain ($10/year).

title: NSE Pre-Open Data Scraper
description: Automated market data scraper with open API - serverless infrastructure with zero operational costs.
longDescription: Built an NSE scraper that downloads pre-open market data daily before market opens. Serverless architecture using GitHub Workflows and Cloudflare R2 storage. Includes a public API for anyone to access the archived data. Built to optimize investment decisions with data-driven insights.

title: Camera Kadai
description: E-commerce platform for camera rentals built with Medusa.js headless commerce.
longDescription: Building a complete camera rental e-commerce platform using Medusa.js. Full-featured rental shop with inventory management, booking system, and payment integration.

title: Zerobook
description: Complete CMS solution for financial services with loan management and reporting.
longDescription: End-to-end CMS designed for financial services. Features loan management, customer tracking, payment schedules, and reporting. Built with security and data integrity as top priorities.
